title: Kale salad
ingredients: ['120ml fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon rapeseed or vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon sugar, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 bunch kale, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 large tomato, seeded and diced', '70g roasted sunflower seeds', '60g dried cranberries']
